channel.title: Slave Rebellions
channel.description:
I think this is an alright thing to show-off. Its not complete yet though. Still much more to go. :)
[img]http://i.imgur.com/oyGg7g0.png[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/oyGg7g0.png[/img]
[COLOR=RED][SIZE=5][FONT=Comic Sans MS]Description[/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR] Slaves revolting. I plan on making this a very interactive feature. Such as them doing animations in a 1 - 3 second basis, them all piling up on you if you attack one of them, and so on. Later, Guards will pile up and charge in to fight the Slaves. Who will win?
Slave rebellions will occur [u]every 30 minutes[/u]. They will drop basic supplies for combat and even drop worthwhile items such as dragon scimitars. They will also drop rares which... will be told soon!
[img]http://i.imgur.com/oyGg7g0.png[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/oyGg7g0.png[/img]
[COLOR=RED][SIZE=5][FONT=Comic Sans MS]NPCs[/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR]
[b]Slaves[COLOR=GREEN] (level 57)[/COLOR][/b] [img]http://puu.sh/6Otis.png[/img]
[B]Roman guards [COLOR=GREEN](level 57 [/color]&[color=RED] level 101)[/COLOR][/B] [img]http://puu.sh/6Otq3.png[/img] [size=1]The one to the right will serve as the Roman Leader.[/size]
[b]Slave leaders [COLOR=RED](level 101)[/COLOR][/b] [img]http://puu.sh/6Otyf.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/oyGg7g0.png[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/oyGg7g0.png[/img]
[COLOR=RED][SIZE=5][FONT=Comic Sans MS]Environment[/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR]
[img]http://puu.sh/6RKoY.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/6RLyD.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/6U6bT.png[/img]

item.title: Slave Rebellions
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“lare69, post:6, topic:540683”]why would slaves drop rares if they’re slaves that doesn’t really make sense

good job though[/quote]
During the Spartacus slave rebellion, the slaves were reported of having money equivalent to making “5,000 coins” as nothing. The slaves could have taken rare items from their domenus or elsewhere.

Read full topic

item.title: Slave Rebellions
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

artem543:

Are the slaves working on the field when not fighting? Would be more amazing to see them working and one guard walking arround.

They will be scattered around the lands.

@arham_4 wrote:

I think this is an alright thing to show-off. Its not complete yet though. Still much more to go.

[COLOR=RED][SIZE=5][FONT=Comic Sans MS]Description[/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR]
Slaves revolting. I plan on making this a very interactive feature. Such as them doing animations in a 1 - 3 second basis, them all piling up on you if you attack one of them, and so on. Later, Guards will pile up and charge in to fight the Slaves. Who will win?

Slave rebellions will occur every 30 minutes. They will drop basic supplies for combat and even drop worthwhile items such as dragon scimitars. They will also drop rares which… will be told soon!
